snippet: HETHERMAN--Lillian Mary (Colman). April 4, 1928 - March 3, 2016. Goddard, BA '51; Eastman School of Music, BM '54 and MM '56. Always a New Yorker at heart, mother and grandmother dearly loved. Margaret, John, Heidi (Maglicic), Chris Hetherman 1/3
lead_paragraph: HETHERMAN--Lillian Mary (Colman). April 4, 1928 - March 3, 2016. Goddard, BA '51; Eastman School of Music, BM '54 and MM '56. Always a New Yorker at heart, mother and grandmother dearly loved. Margaret, John, Heidi (Maglicic), Chris Hetherman 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  HETHERMAN, LILLIAN MARY (COLMAN)
